Generate module¶

class Generate.Generate¶

Bases: object

Constructor for Generate object

Parameters

  • algorithm (String) – Algorithm to use to generate Phrase

  • params – Array of params to pass into generative algorithm

Returns

Returns a Phrase object

Return type

Phrase

static check_params(alg_name, required_params, params)¶

Static utility method that checks to make sure all required parameters were passed in to generative algorithm.

Parameters

  • alg_name – Name of algorithm

  • required_params – Required parameters

  • params (Dict) – Parameters passed in

Returns

No return, raises ValueError

Return type

None

static copy_ctor(old_generate)¶

Static copy constructor for Generate.

Parameters

old_phrase (Generate) – Generate object to copy

Returns

Returns a Generate object, copy of old_generate

Return type

Generate

generate_map_mod()¶

Generative algorithm that maps numbers to scale degrees and scale modulations based on an input file.

Parameters

  • params (Dictionary) – Dictionary of parameters

  • params["scales"] (List) – List of Scales to generate notes from (and modulate to)

  • params["input"] (Text file) – Input file to read from

  • params["gen_len"] (int) – How long of a phrase to generate

Returns

Returns an array of Note objects

Return type

List

Melody Gen
